
## d10 Inactive

```{r d10-inactive, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
d10i1 = read_d10i(file1, type1)
d10i2 = read_d10i(file2, type2)
d10i.diff = diff_d10i(d10i1, d10i2)
d10i.rmse.station = rmse_d10i(d10i.diff, "Station")
d10i.rmse.time = rmse_d10i(d10i.diff, "Time")

d10i.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_d10i) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("d10 Inactive Differences at Stations")
d10i.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_d10i) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("d10 Inactive RMSE at Stations")
d10i.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_d10i) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("d10 Inactive RMSE Through Time")
```
